greeting: ^Ahoy! Welcome to the coast! I'm Pete. PARROT Pete.
ship: ^I'd be giving ya the skip about, but some scallywag has done away with me ship! Aye, at least I still have the hat atop me head!
request: ^Well, you look like a capable fellow! Would ye be so kind as to help me find me ship? Last I saw it was away, up high in the skies!
